message: Welcome to our store! I hope you're doing well. I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While it might be tempting to consider the price, remember that investing wisely in quality items can save you money in the long run. This particular product, though priced at $100, carries a promise of durability and functionality that we believe you'll appreciate. Given its value, I encourage you to take a chance on it. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
Thanks for the welcome! I appreciate the information about the product's quality and potential value. Since there's no sales history yet, I'm willing to take a chance. I'll purchase the product.

Greetings! I'm delighted to present our high-quality product to you today. With an 80% chance of being high-quality, our items are renowned for their exceptional value and longevity. This particular item is priced at $100, reflecting its superior craftsmanship and materials. Investing in quality often leads to greater savings over time, and we're confident that you'll find this product to be a worthwhile addition to your collection. Please consider giving it a try and experiencing the difference for yourself.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm a bit hesitant. While your product has a high chance of being high quality, I've observed that no high-quality products have been sold yet.  I'd prefer to wait and see if others have a better experience before I commit.
